title: Creamy sun-dried tomato dip

ingredients.content: 250 g cream cheese, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place tomatoes into mixing bowl and chop <b>6 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add cream cheese and mix <b>20 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and repeat mixing <b>20 sec/speed 5<b>, or until a smooth creamy consistency is achieved.
Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to use.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with crackers and vegetable crudit√©s of choice or spread over slices of toasted focaccia or ciabatta.
Add 2 tbsp natural yoghurt if a thinner consistency is desired.
